title: Wisdom
content:
Wisdom Druids, Rangers, and Clerics use Wisdom as their Spelicasting Ability - the likelihood spells will land.

Druids, Rangers, and Clerics use Wisdom as their Spelicasting Ability - the likelihood spells will land.

Wisdom is an Ability in Baldur's Gate 3. Each ability affects a broad range of capabilities, including skills or Spells that a character or a monster can be proficient in.
